1520450.name: Adapted Adventures: Crystal Cave Soundtrack
1520450.description:
Adapted Adventures: Crystal Cave is a short visual novel following our protagonist Hikari and team HARK as they (Hikari, Audrey, Robin, and Kyra) investigate disappearances in the neo crystal world.

The wonderful soundtrack for our premier game, Adapted Adventures: Crystal Cave.
Composed and produced by the exceptionally talented Rafael Pineda.
